name: Dovekie
body:
### Software Engineering

[Ohm's Law Simulator](https://github.com/dovekie/circuit_simulator)

### Science Fiction Writing
"Bodies in Water" Analog Science Fiction and Fact, May 2014  
"The Deer Girl Hitches a Ride" Analog Science Fiction and Fact, December 2013  
"On Dragon Eyes" Mad Scientist Journal, July 2013  
"Launch Window" Analog Science Fiction and Fact, April 2013  
"Carbon Wings" Andromeda Spaceways Inflight Magazine, May 2012

### Philosophy
Every difficult coding problem just a series of trivially small coding problems.  
Take the cover off of the machine and see the gears move.  
The world is more complicated than it appears.  
Kindness must be practiced; kind acts lead to more kind acts, but cruelty only leads to more cruelty.


### Contact
